title: Perth's Mitchell Freeway
creator_credit: Norman A. Uren and Western Australian Government Film Unit
brief_description: The application of the Mitchell Freeway plan to Perth, its immediate advantage in handling growing traffic densities and the long term implications of city development, are seen in their close inter-relationships.
creator_credit_for_label: Norman A. Uren and Western Australian Government Film Unit
